nodes.text: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back – The 40th Anniversary Covers by Chris Sprouse 1

Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back – The 40th Anniversary Covers by Chris Sprouse 1 is a one-shot that reprints the thirty-six Empire Strikes Back variant covers commissioned for the film's fortieth anniversary. It was written by Jess Harrold, and it features artwork and commentary by Chris Sprouse. It was published by Marvel Comics on April 28, 2021.

To celebrate the 40th anniversary of one of the all-time great cinematic sequels, Marvel asked enthusiastic artist Chris Sprouse (Black Panther, Star Wars: Age of Rebellion) to retell The Empire Strikes Back in a stunning series of variant covers!

Month by month, across multiple Star Wars series, the film's unforgettable moments played out through Sprouse's exquisite artwork. Now the whole story of the resurgent Empire targeting the Rebel Alliance's icy base on Hoth – and every momentous event that follows – is collected in this commemorative issue, complete with Sprouse's commentary and a gallery of behind-the-scenes artwork!

Bounty hunters target Han Solo! Luke Skywalker seeks out Jedi Master Yoda! Feelings run high between Han and Leia! And as the battle begins for Skywalker's soul, will his fear lead to anger, hate and the dark side?
